name: Firefighter (bei)
description:
Play as a firefighter to drive a fire truck to the burning area and then extinguish the fire.

Controls

Driving

W or Up arrow to increase throttle
S or down arrow to decrease throttle
A D or Left right arrow to steer
Space to start the sirens

Fighting fire

WASD or arrow keys to move the lift
Space to shoot water
Left or right CTRL to call the helicopter when ready
